dependencies.prettier-plugin-organize-imports: A Prettier plugin that sorts import statements and removes unused ones.
dependencies.prettier-plugin-packagejson: A Prettier plugin that sorts properties in the `package.json` file.

devDependencies.typescript: A statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.
devDependencies.vite-plugin-dts: A Vite plugin that generates TypeScript declaration files.

peerDependencies.typescript: A statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.
